name: Yola
content:
Yola was a female Miraluka Jedi Master stationed on Carrick Station during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Yola served as a Jedi Consular and combat instructor.
Yola appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic. She was originally going to serve as a Jedi Consular trainer but the content was cut. Yola's file can be found on Jedipedia.https://swtor.jedipedia.net/en/npc/master-yola
